config.name: Rebearth Remastered
config.summary: The remastered Minecraft Earth themed resource pack!
description: This pack aims to port all of the custom mobs and features that are exclusive to Minecraft Earth to Minecraft Java!

Entities:

Albino Cow
Amber Chicken
Ashen Cow
Bold Striped Rabbit
Bone Spider
Bouldering Zombie
Bronzed Chicken

Brule Cow
Cluckshroom
Cookie Cow

Dairy Cow
Fancy Chicken
Flecked Sheep
Furnace Golem
Glow Squid

Gold-Crested Chicken
Harelequin Rabbit
Horned Sheep
Inky Sheep
Jolly Llama
Jumbo Rabbit
Lobber Zombie
Melon Golem
Midnight Chicken
Moobloom
Moolip

Mottled Pig
Muddy Foot Rabbit
Muddy Pig
Pale Pig
Piebald pig
Pink Footed Pig

Pinto Cow
Rainbow Sheep
Rocky Sheep
Skeleton Wolf
Spotted pig

Skewbald Chicken

Sooty Pig
Stormy Chicken
Sunset Cow
Tropical Slime
Vested Rabbit
Viler Witch
Wooly Cow

Blocks:

Block of Ruby
Buttercup
Adventure Chests
Pink Daisy
Rainbow Bed
Rainbow Carpet
Ruby Ore
Rainbow Wool

Items:

Music Disc - Earth
Music Disc - Sprouting
Ruby
config.optifine: OptiFine is used to add support for custom entity models and random entity textures.
